editions.name: Energy Drink
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Energy Drink is loved by athletes, professionals, students and travellers on long journeys all over the world

editions.name: Energy Drink Sugarfree
editions.flavor_description: Sugarfree Wings. Red Bull Sugarfree Energy Drink is the sugarfree version of Red Bull Energy Drink

editions.name: The Green Edition
editions.flavor_description: Freshly sour-sweet taste plus a hint of floral aroma matches a fresh and bubbly atmosphere, forming an exciting and refreshing feeling

editions.name: The Purple Edition
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Purple Edition instantly explodes with the unique seductive taste of Acai berry, a sour sweet taste that directly hits the palate
